metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16088 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Xpdf 3.04 has a SIGSEGV in XRef::fetch in XRef.cc after many recursivecalls to Catalog::countPageTree in Catalog.cc.

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
